alert.note: Alert for Northern Jasper; Northern Newton; Tyler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 27 at 9:56PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Vernon Parish, Tyler, northern Newton and northern Jasper Counties through 1030 PM CDT... At 956 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Browndell to near Colmesneil. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...outflow winds in excess of 30 mph from the northwest. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Woodville, Newton, Colmesneil, Chester, Ebenezer, Rockland, Warren, Town Bluff, Burkeville, Browndell, Farrsville, Magnolia Springs, Mayflower, Spurger, Jamestown, Roganville, Harrisburg, Stringtown, and Ivanhoe. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
